library(flexdashboard)
library(stringr)
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(dygraphs)
library(lubridate)
library(xts)
library(bakeoff)

bakers <- bakeoff::bakers
challenges <- bakeoff::challenges
episodes <- bakeoff::episodes
ratings <- bakeoff::ratings

bakers <- bakers %>% 
  select(series, baker, hometown, series_winner) %>% 
  separate(hometown, c("city", "other"), sep = ",") %>% 
  mutate(admin_name.y = city)

england_loc <- read_csv("../data/gb.csv")
england_loc <- england_loc %>% 
  select(city, lat, lng, admin_name)

### Chart B

```{r}
flex_ufo_data %>% 
  group_by(sighting_year) %>% 
  summarize(n_year = n()) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(aes(x = sighting_year, y = n_year)) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Sighting Count", title = "UFO Sightings in Colorado per Year") +
  theme_few()

viewers <- ratings %>% 
  mutate(uk_airdate = ymd(uk_airdate)) %>% 
  select(uk_airdate, viewers_7day, viewers_28day) 

xts <- xts(x = viewers[,-1], order.by = viewers_7day$uk_airdate)

p <- dygraph(xts) %>% dyRangeSelector()
p
```
